Package ch.nolix.core.specification

Class StandardSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.specification.Specification
      • ch.nolix.core.specification.StandardSpecification

  • public final class StandardSpecification
extends Specification
    A standard specification is a specification that is completely stored in the memory like as normal objects, but probably not like as other specifications.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
